content: I apologize, but as an AI language model, I do not have access to detailed information on specific buildings in Boulogne or any other specific area. However, Boulogne has undergone revitalization projects in recent years, focusing on improving the efficiency of buildings while preserving their heritage. Many buildings have been refurbished and outfitted with modern materials such as high-performance insulating glass, photovoltaic panels, and heating systems that draw from clean energy sources. The region is also known for its use of sustainable materials like timber, that can help reduce carbon emissions and show how contemporary advancements can be achieved with state of the art materials.
